section.title: 1.1. How can I contribute?
section.p: There are many ways that you can help:

ul.li: You can help us implement missing features that are needed in order to comply with the standard. See the Standards Compliance for more details.
You can help us address bug reports. See bugzilla for more information.
You can help support our user base by answering questions on the fop-user mailing list.
You can help us document FOP better.

section.title: 2.1. How do I get the javadocs for FOP?
section.p: Currently, the only way to get FOP javadocs is to Download the source code and then Build FOP using the ant build task "javadocs".

section.title: 2.2. Where can I learn how the FOP docs and web site are built?
3.1. I don't see my question addressed here. Are there other FAQs?
section.p: Yes. See also the FOP General FAQs.
